recipesJson.name: Iced Cherry Blossom
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description: A spin on the Japanese Sakura ice cream with a hint of honey. FLV added to give a little more of the floral note. If you don't want the floral, you can take it out and increase TPA up about .5% for the deeper sweeter, less floral cherry blossom.

reviews.text: This is absolutely fantastic! Everything blends together so nicely into a delicious ADV for me. (Note: Swapped TPA VBIC for LB VIC because I'm a pepper taster.)
Delicious as fuck. A perfect all day vape with a nice sweet floral top note. The honey here actually works really well and I'm truly surprised how much I enjoy this simple ice cream base.
